column4: Hi. Tried using that mirror you supplied just now, but the accept buttons stays grayed out in Synaptic. URL correct?

most of the third party mirrors are on a delay compared to the main ones thus you might not be able to get the latest updates on those servers, to find the best one for you choose one in your country or close to it with the least delay.
plan B is just to wait until the main one kicks back on wich most of us are doing I think
